options: ['taking showers at 9p. m.', 'smoking out of the bedroom', "telling the host at 7p. m. if you don't have dinner", "using the host's mobile phone to receive phone calls"]
questions: You can do the following except   _
article:
House Rules
1. Please clean up before leaving.
2. Showers to be taken before 11 p. m.
3. No staying out 'after 10p. m. unless allowed by me.
4. You may have incoming calls on my mobile phone but no out going calls.
5. Bed time is 11 p. m.
6. Dinner is at 7p. m. unless noticed.  . (If you don't have dinner, you must let us know before 6 p. m. )
7. Keep noise to the least.
8. No smoking in the bedroom.
CB4 1LT

112 Kendal Way
Chesterton
Cambridge
